soloroid.title: Soloroid
soloroid.description: Solaroid is an 'Instagramish' photo sharing site using the NASA API. Built over a weekend for a code competition. Implemented an infinite scrolling feature, which dynamically loads more photos once you scoll to the bottom of the page. A user can like, and share photos.

jamiekaram.dev.title: jamiekaram.dev
jamiekaram.dev.description: Version 2 of my personal website. This was a great oppertunity to further develop my UI and Figma expierince.

beverage-genetics-coffee-matcher.title: Beverage Genetics Flavour Profile
beverage-genetics-coffee-matcher.description: Beverage Genetics recommends coffee flavor's based on a customers flavour profile. I designed and developed an easy to use survey that can be modified easily by the owner.

instagram-scraper.title: Instagram Scraper
instagram-scraper.description: Scrape 'likes' and other pertinent information. Create a model with the data and calculate the optimal time to post on Instagram and maximize likes.

how-old-were-they.title: How Old Were They?
how-old-were-they.description: Find out the age of an actor during the making of a movie they are in. This was my first project outside of Bootcamp. I am definetly going to revisit and add more features.
